awd_titl_txt: XIVth International Conference on Organometallic Chemistry--Detroit, Michigan, August 19-24, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: This award from the Inorganic, Bioinorganic and Organometallic                  Chemistry Program will enable twenty U.S. graduate students to                  attend the XIV International Conference on Organometallic                       Chemistry in Detroit, Michigan, August 19-24, 1990. The                         conference is expected to attract more than 500 scientists with                 demonstrated research interests in organometallic chemistry and                 particularly its applications in new materials. The primary                     goals of the 1990 meeeting are to provide opportunities for                     full participation both to young researchers in the United                      States and to scientists from less-developed nations, to                        stimulate interaction between academic and industrial chemists                  in the U.S., and to provide a forum for the latest developments                 in the broad field of organometallic chemistry.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
